price: Ẹ̀yin tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, tí ẹ bá ran (ẹ̀sìn) Allāhu lọ́wọ́, (Allāhu) máa ràn ẹ̀yin náà lọ́wọ́. Ó sì máa mú ẹsẹ̀ yín dúró ṣinṣin (nínú ẹ̀sìn).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَنصُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرۡكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتۡ أَقۡدَامَكُمۡ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tanṣurū al-laha yanṣur'kum wayuthabbit aqdāmakum
